solution_line_template: She uses {pencils_per_day} pencils a day because {pencils_per_school_week} / {school_days_per_week} = <<{pencils_per_school_week}/{school_days_per_week}={pencils_per_day}>>{pencils_per_day}
She will use {total_pencils_needed} pencils in {total_days} days because {pencils_per_day} x {total_days} = <<{pencils_per_day}*{total_days}={total_pencils_needed}>>{total_pencils_needed}
She will need {packs_needed} packs of pencils because {total_pencils_needed} / {pencils_per_pack} = <<{total_pencils_needed}/{pencils_per_pack}={packs_needed}>>{packs_needed}
